Involvement

There are many ways to get involved with Seeking His Kingdom, whether through contributing content, providing feedback and suggestions, or even just prayers! Here are some options to consider:

Content Contributions

If you are a writer, theologian, or scholar interested in contributing articles, study guides, or other resources, we would love to hear from you. Please contact us with your ideas and qualifications.

Feedback & Suggestions

Your feedback is invaluable in helping us improve SHK. Whether you have suggestions for new features, notice any issues, or simply want to share your experience using the site, please reach out to us via our contact page .

Financial Support

As a non-profit project, we rely on donations to sustain and grow our offerings. If you would like to support Seeking His Kingdom financially, please visit our donation page for more information.
